item.title: The Splendor Board Game Is Under $20 Right Now for Cyber Monday
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/splendor-board-game-cyber-monday-deal-2024

This fast-paced strategy game should be a staple at your holiday gatherings.

Hear ye, hear ye! The hit board game Splendor is on sale for $19.99 at Amazon right now for Cyber Monday — a 50% markdown from the game's $39.99 retail price, which saves those who purchase it a total of $20.00. It's the best deal we've seen on this beloved strategy game all year, including its discounted price during Prime Day in October.

Get Splendor Now for $19.99

Splendor Board Game

Splendor was released in 2014 and has remained a popular title among board game enthusiasts since. The beauty of Splendor lies in its simplicity: It's a great game to bust out a family gathering for players of all ages and experience levels due to its intuitive ruleset and average 30-minute playtime. Once you get a handle on the basic premise of the game, there's room for plenty of strategy to come into play.

It's an economic engine game designed around the concept that players are working to build an increasingly powerful economy to buy cards that earn them points (dubbed "prestige" in the world of Splendor). In good ol' Renaissance fashion, your currency is none other than gemstones, which are represented by multi-colored tokens. The end goal is to reach 15 prestige points, which you accumulate by purchasing cards worth variable amounts of points with the gems you collect. If you're spending your gems on cards wisely, you might even become eligible for a visit from a noble, which gives you a massive point boost.

Splendor is a race to the finish line among players, but this game doesn't make it easy. Whether it's your rival reserving a card you had your eye on or someone hoarding the already-limited supply of tokens that you needed to purchase the card you've been saving up for, there's plenty of curveballs along the way that make game sessions with friends and family ripe with tension and necessitate thorough planning.

For the price you're paying, this is a fantastic board game to snag this December, whether it be for your own collection or a fun gift that you can count on arriving before the holidays. If you'd rather pick it up in-person, Target is also selling Splendor at the same price for Cyber Monday. Plus, Target Circle is offering a Buy 2, Get 1 Free promotion on a wide selection of other games that you could pair with this one for the perfect starter strategy game kit to gift any board game fan.

Other Cyber Monday Board Game Deals

For more great prices on popular board games, check out IGN's deep-dive into all best board game deals we've found for Cyber Monday. Save big on contemporary favorites like Exploding Kittens, Settlers of Catan, and Ticket to Ride along with beloved classics like The Game of Life, Guess Who, and Twister.

item.title: Last Chance to Save $20 on Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 in Cyber Monday Sales
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/warhammer-40000-space-marine-2-cyber-monday-deal-2024

Black Friday had plenty of great video game deals, and thankfully, many of them carried over into Cyber Monday. If you've been itching to jump into the world of Space Marine 2, the game is still discounted at Amazon to $49.99 for PS5 and Xbox Series X. This is $20 off its original price of $69.99, and considering we think it's one of the best games of 2024, it's definitely worth picking up.

This deal likely won't stick around for long past Cyber Monday, so act fast to add it to your virtual shopping cart before it's gone.

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Xbox Series X

IGN's Chris Reed gave this game an 8/10 in our Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 review. He said it's "a terrific third-person shooter with a compelling story, loads of weapons that are a blast to use, and a healthy variety of enemies to use them on. It once again borrows many of its ideas from the Gears of War series, but they’re good ideas, and Space Marine 2 does a fine job of making them its own."

It's not the only game deal on our radar right now, either. Also at Amazon, you can save on the Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol.1 for Switch, Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown for PS5, Star Wars Outlaws for PS5 and Xbox Series X, and Sonic X Shadow Generations for PS5, Xbox Series X, and Switch. And if you want to see even more gaming deals, have a look at our breakdown of 22 of the best Cyber Monday gaming deals.

There's plenty more still on sale outside of games as well. In our roundup of the best Cyber Monday deals this year, you can see some of our favorites that are still live, including discounts on Apple devices, TVs, streaming deals, and so much more.

What Is Cyber Monday?

Traditionally, Black Friday was the in-store shopping frenzy, while Cyber Monday focused on online deals. While those lines have blurred, Cyber Monday remains the top event for online-focused retailers like Amazon, Newegg, Dell, HP, and Lenovo. Even traditional retailers like Best Buy, Target, and Walmart roll out exclusive online-only offers. Switch and PS5 deals are also now live.

Many of the same deals from Black Friday normally return for Cyber Monday 2024, including some that sold out or expired. Retailers often stagger their inventory, reserving stock for each major sale event. This means Cyber Monday will bring back popular deals alongside brand-new, never-before-seen offers. But, most importantly, Cyber Monday is the final day of the Black Friday sale season, with most the deals going with it.

Hannah Hoolihan is a freelance writer who works with the Guides and Commerce teams here at IGN.
